item.title: How the Provinces Conquer
item.description:
Below is a translation of a lecture given by György Spiró in 2006. Here is the original hungarian transcript and videos here and here. The lecture explores how a superpower decays and falls due to the spread of ideas from its periphery to its center. Nearly twenty years have passed since this lecture. Ideas once considered fringe are now at the superpower’s center. Will history repeat or rhyme?

VIII. Semester, Lecture 5 - March 20, 2006
